application.model

Class GameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.model.GameModel

  • public class GameModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents main game. Includes the runtime and animation logic for the game.
    Author:
    Michael Cavazos, Gregory Pugh, Divya Emani
